about.mainText: For over 20 years at CreativePeople, we've been creating design and doing it great
about.description: We focus on the knowledge we've accumulated. We understand how emotions in digital become impressions, and rational interaction results transform into consumer experience

petProjects.softwareDescription: Software for determining the state of urban green spaces from photographs

alfaYouth.title: Next Generation Subscription Alfa Youth
alfaYouth.short: Alfa Youth is a unique subscription for young people that each user can customize for themselves
alfaYouth.full: Alfa Youth is a unique subscription for young people that each user can customize for themselves. On the Alfa Bank website or app, users will have access to an online assistant that will help determine the optimal set of services.

friendlyTelegram.title: Friendly Telegram Mini App for ITMO
friendlyTelegram.short: Friendly – Telegram Mini App for students. Find people by interests, share goals
friendlyTelegram.full: Friendly – Telegram Mini App for students. Find people by interests, share goals

marketplace.title: Corporate Marketplace
marketplace.short: The first corporate marketplace for company employees with a loyalty program
marketplace.full: The first corporate marketplace for company employees with a loyalty program. Simple mechanics, just like Ozon, Yandex Market, Wildberries, both for the mobile app and the seller's cabinet

greenAnalysis.title: Software for determining the state of urban green spaces from photographs
greenAnalysis.short: Created from scratch a mobile app design for uploading images of green spaces and instant AI-powered analysis of their condition
greenAnalysis.full: Created from scratch a mobile app design for uploading images of green spaces and instant AI-powered analysis of their condition. The system automatically determines plant species, identifies diseases and defects, generates inventory lists and visual charts

carat.title: Redesign of Carat Furniture Factory Main Page
carat.short: Mobile application for uploading images of green spaces and instant AI-powered analysis of their condition
carat.full: Mobile application for uploading images of green spaces and instant AI-powered analysis of their condition. The system automatically determines plant species, identifies diseases and defects, generates inventory lists and visual charts

pandaGifts.title: Targeted Landing Pages for Target Audience
pandaGifts.short: Together with a marketer, we adapted the company's assets and values for the target audience
pandaGifts.full: Together with a marketer, we adapted the company's assets and values for the target audience: marketers, HR, designers and architects. We designed 8 major cases, selected graphic materials. We created content, design and adjusted the WordPress template
